body_html:
@ebrevdo Could you help me modify my simple example code ? I have posted my code and dataset.

#binary classification of dense input data using logistic regression
python ./logistic_regression.py --train ./data/feature.normed.rand.12000.0_2.txt --test ./data/feature.normed.rand.12000.1_2.txt
This will be ok...
0 auc: 0.776691260816 cost: 1439.02
1 auc: 0.876033213903 cost: 538.457
2 auc: 0.893921799102 cost: 495.259
3 auc: 0.900204872568 cost: 480.429

#binary classification of sparse input data using logistic regression
python ./logistic_regression_sparse.py --train ./data/feature.trate.0_2.normed.txt --test ./data/feature.trate.1_2.normed.txt

This one is really slow(batch size 50), and if setting to large batch size(500) will cause memroy error, could you help me modify it(logistic_regression_sparse.py) to work ? Thanks !

https://github.com/chenghuige/tensorflow-example
